products.title: Arcadia Porcelain Vertical Blind
products.description: If you want to keep your window area simple and streamlined, then the arcadia porcelain vertical blind is a fantastic choice, with rigid pvc vanes and no chains. products.title: Arcadia Sugar White Vertical Blind
products.description: Create a cool, clean look at your windows with this fresh waterproof 100% pvc arcadia sugar white vertical blind. products.title: Arcadia Sedate Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Truly sedate and stylish, this lightly coloured, smoothly textured grey vertical blind will hang with perfect minimalism at your window. The vanes are rigid so require no bottom weights or chains, great for creating a modern streamlined look. products.title: Arcadia Chartreuse
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1340mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 25% polyester / 75% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
